operations.notes:
Adds the account identified to the forum identified. This is used for shared Forums to add more than one account to the Forum. If the isOwner flag is set to TRUE, the Forum must not have a pre-existing owner.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ACCOUNT ALWAYS
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_FORUMS ALWAYS

Note: The user must belong to the Account being added to the Forum or must be a System Administrator.

This operation requires a Add Forum Account Data value.

This operation returns a HTTP 200 OK response upon success.

responseMessages.message: OK

Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to add an account to the forum or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Forum Not Found

If the Forum identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the forum cannot be found.

Invalid Forum Data

If the Forum Account data provided is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Account Forum Exception if any data provided for the Forum is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the Account to add to the Agilquest shared forum
parameters.name: sysidAccount

operations.notes:
Adds an existing Account defined in its own Forum to the Agilquest shared forum.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ACCOUNT ALWAYS
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_FORUMS ALWAYS

Note: The user must belong to the Account being added to the Forum or must be a System Administrator.

This operation requires no value to be POSTed within the body. The SYSID of the Account to add is included in the Path Parameter.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to add an Account or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Forum Not Found

If the Forum identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the forum cannot be found.

Invalid Forum Data

If the Forum Account data provided is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Account Forum Exception if any data provided for the Forum is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the Forum that will be set as the User's active Forum.
parameters.name: sysidForum

operations.notes:
Sets the active forum for the user identified by the authentication token to the forum identified by the given forum system ID.

Note: If the requestor is the SystemAdmin, the the forum is switched with no pre-conditions.

Note: If the requestor is not the SystemAdmin, the user's Account must be a member of the indicated Forum, and the forum must be active.

This operation returns a HTTP 200 OK status on success.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to set the forum active or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Forum Not Found

If the Forum identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the forum cannot be found.

Invalid Forum Data

If the Forum Account data provided is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Account Forum Exception if any data provided for the Forum is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes: Get all currency types associated with the forum.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to manage the User's account, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Creates a new Forum, adding a new account if provided and initializing with default values if requested.

This operation is intended for management of multiple forums used by multiple accounts. The requestor must be the SystemAdmin, or a AuthorizationException is thrown.

This operation requires a Account Data value.

This operation returns a Account Data value of the Forum's owning Account.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to create a Forum or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Forum Data

If the Forum Account data provided is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Password Exception if the password provided for the Forum Account does not match password policies.

Account Forum Exception if any data provided for the Forum is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Switches the Forum and Account that the user is currently accessing.

Note: This is only accessible by the System Administrator

This operation requires a Switch Context value.

This operation returns a HTTP 200 OK response on success.

responseMessages.message: OK

Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to switch the Admin Context or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Forum or Account Not Found

If the Forum or Account identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Forum or Account cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: {@link PublicAccount} describing the Account to add to the Public space.
parameters.name: _account

operations.notes:
Creates a new Account in the special Agilquest shared forum. The Account is not a traditional Account in that it doesn't have it's own Forum and is only defined in the Agilquest shared Forum.

This operation requires a Public Account value with the following fields:

Field NameRequirementDescription
name REQUIREDString name of the Account, used for display purposes.
login REQUIREDString unique login associated with the Account.
password REQUIREDString password associated with the Account login.
description OPTIONALString display text describing the Account.

This operation returns a Account Data value for the created Account.

responseMessages.message: ([created]) on successful creation of the Account.

Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to create a public account or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Forum Not Found

If the Forum identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the forum cannot be found.

Invalid Forum Data

If the Forum Account data provided is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Account Forum Exception if any data provided for the Forum is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation updates the Forum provided into a shared forum, meaning that more than one Account may have resources, users, etc., defined within the Forum.

Note: The Forum to be shared must already be created using the Create Forum operation.

This operation is intended for management of multiple forums used by multiple accounts. The requestor must be the SystemAdmin, or a AuthorizationException is thrown.

This operation requires a Forum Data value of the Forum that will be shared.

This operation returns a Forum Data value of the Forum that will be shared.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to create a shared forum or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Forum Data

If the Forum Account data provided is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Account Forum Exception if any data provided for the Forum is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the Forum information to retrieve.
parameters.name: sysidForum

operations.notes:
Retrieves the forum data for the given Forum Sysid value. This describes the Forum and lists the Members of the Forum.

This operation is intended for management of multiple forums used by multiple accounts. The requestor must be the SystemAdmin, or a AuthorizationException is thrown.

This operation returns a Update Forum Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to request the Forum or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Forum Not Found

If the Forum identified by the given SYSID cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the Forum identified cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates the identified forum with the given forum data value.

This operation is intended for management of multiple forums used by multiple accounts. The requestor must be the SystemAdmin, or a AuthorizationException is thrown.

This operation requires a Data value.

This operation returns a Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to update a forum or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Forum Not Found

If the Forum identified cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the forum cannot be found.

Invalid Forum Data

If the Forum Account data provided is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Account Forum Exception if any data provided for the Forum is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.
